table.name: berli_crmtogo_defaults
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `berli_crmtogo_defaults` ( `fetch_limit` int(3) NOT NULL, `crmtogo_lang` varchar(5) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `defaulttheme` varchar(1) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `crm_version` varchar(5) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci

table.name: berli_crmtogo_config
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `berli_crmtogo_config` ( `crmtogouser` int(19) NOT NULL, `navi_limit` int(3) NOT NULL, `theme_color` varchar(1) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `compact_cal` int(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`crmtogouser`), CONSTRAINT `fk_1_berli_crmtogo_config` FOREIGN KEY (`crmtogouser`) REFERENCES `vtiger_users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci

table.name: berli_crmtogo_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `berli_crmtogo_modules` ( `crmtogo_user` int(19) NOT NULL, `crmtogo_module` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `crmtogo_active` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `order_num` int(3) NOT NULL, KEY `fk_1_berli_crmtogo_modules` (`crmtogo_user`), CONSTRAINT `fk_1_berli_crmtogo_modules` FOREIGN KEY (`crmtogo_user`) REFERENCES `vtiger_users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci
